remarks: A linear function is completely determined (or overdetermined) by its values on a spanning subset.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 7-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by NM, 17-Jun-2017.)
statement:
lspextmo.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
lspextmo.k $e |- K = ( LSpan ` S ) $.
lspextmo $p |- ( ( X C_ B /\ ( K ` X ) = B ) -> E* g e. ( S LMHom T ) ( g |` X ) = F ) $.
$d B g $.
$d F g $.
$d K g $.
$d S g $.
$d T g $.
$d X g $.
